Comment.val: /*Test program to display the VAT-invoices and produce Internal (TAP) VatInvoice-message*/

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <!-- // XmlSchema file: nl.topicus.epp.tap.vatinvoice.request.xsd - version: 01.00.00 --> <viireq:vatInvoiceInternalRequest xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.topicus.nl/epp/tap/VatInvoice/Request nl.topicus.epp.tap.vatinvoice.request.xsd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:viireq="http://www.topicus.nl/epp/tap/VatInvoice/Request"> <invoice> <id>@1@</id> </invoice> </viireq:vatInvoiceInternalRequest>',Trim(Str({0,1344274433},'')))
